name: Time's Up
description: Join members of Discovery's crew to investigate a fatal future scientific discovery: time travel is fatal, and everyone on your crew not of the present, prime universe is at risk.
rules:
-- In this Hybrid Event, you will complete Supply Missions in one Phase, and Ship Battles in another Phase.
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- Unique Ship Battles and Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Booker, Linus, Stamets, Courier Burnham, Mirror Universe crew or crew with a matching battle trait will provide a bonus to Ship Battles and Supply Missions.
-- Using the Orion Syndicate Interceptor, I.S.S. Avenger, or Hirogen Hunter will provide a hull bonus in Skirmish Battles.
-- Community Rewards are also available during Phase 1 only. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- Every Ship Battle or Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Booker, Linus, Stamets, Courier Burnham, or Mirror Crew
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.flavor: After forty years of dutiful isolation, Sahil is commissioned as a Federation communications officer.

adventures.name: Historical Significance
adventures.description: Determine if historical significance worses degeneration.

adventures.name: Chroniton Readings
adventures.description: Augment scans of chronitons and other time-based matter.

adventures.name: There and Back Again
adventures.description: Interview individuals who traveled through time and back.

adventures.name: Virology Report
adventures.description: A full report on temporal degeneration.

rewards.name: Time's Up
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

content.reroll_info:
Skirmish rewards are additive. By continuously rolling you receive additional rewards. No rewards are lost by rolling again.
DROP RATES:
Event VP: 13.58%
Time Portal Pack: 0.13%
Chronitons: 11.45%
Honor: 14.11%
Intel: 27.43%
Credits: 33.29%

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

next_threshold_rewards.name: Chronitons
next_threshold_rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

screens.text: "Just hold on, Book. We're going to find a way to help you. Linus, tell the captain what you told me."

"We've heard rumors... something's happening in the Terran Empire. People are getting sick, dying. And now Book. There's a commonality between them, but... I don't want to make a hypothesis without more data."
"And we're gonna get you all the data you need. Captain, I need your help. Book needs your help. Let's look into this."
"Thank you for volunteering your crew, Captain. Unfortunately, a number of your crew are starting to fall ill as well."
"We can't wait to watch people die. I'm going to go into the Terran Empire, see if I can turn these reports into facts."

responses.text: "Nevertheless, we need to keep working on this problem."
"Burnham is a Starfleet officer, she can handle herself."
"I'm not afraid of a bunch of slavers. They should be afraid of me."

screens.text: "No... no way. I've heard rumors about the Terran Empire, too... that they're becoming chummy with the Orion Syndicate... or the Syndicate sees an opportunity with all of them getting sick."
"You sound just like Michael... they beat this suicidal bravery into you at the academy?"
"This isn't the Syndicate of the past... they're from the future, where they have tech you've never seen and ways you couldn't imagine."

"Book's right about the Syndicate. I'll need cover if I'm going to infiltrate the Terran Empire, especially if there's another mirror version of me running around I'll have to neutralize first. Keep them busy, Captain."
